synopsis.text: After a chance encounter, Shouji Fujimoto, a single father and aspiring picture book author, finds himself in the world of Minami Takasaki, a beloved idol on the children's show "Let's Sing Along With Our Songstress!". Shouji's daughter, Kana, is a devoted fan of Minami, who despite her cheerful on-screen persona, yearns for a genuine relationship. As Shouji and Minami navigate the complexities of their budding romance, they must confront the challenges posed by Minami's celebrity status and the industry's expectations of purity and scandal-free life. Can Shouji help Minami break free from her lonely existence without jeopardizing her career, or will the pressures of fame prove too much for this unlikely couple? This touching and mature love story explores the human side of stardom and the lengths one man will go to for love.
